events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to return it and get a refund because the product is not what I expected.
The issue has been flagged as a refund request due to customer's return inquiry.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund case.
Hello! I’m Sarah from support. I’m here to help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the product is unopened or used for our return policy?
The order number is 123456789. The package is unopened and still sealed as delivered.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please use our prepaid return label to send the product back.
Great, thank you for the quick response. I will send the product back using the label immediately.
The refund process is now set up. Once we receive the returned product, your refund will be processed within 3 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund or if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for the smooth process and help.
We are glad to hear that your refund was successful. Closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
